metadata.description:
U just got back home... U see it's on fire...
There is nothing to be saved, but u keep staring at the flames... Everything u were collecting and enjoying, working for years... It is all gone now...

But the dream to make it in web3 gives hope for a bright future... We will rebuild & move ahead!
